channel.title: Startups,hiring on Matt's Product Blog

item.title: Startup's 1st PM: Henchman or a Hero?
item.description: I recently had a chat with the CEO of a small, scrappy, and successful startup. Let’s call him “Mike.” Mike’s company is pulling in a few million dollars a year with a very lean team. They’ve made it past the “Will we survive?” phase but now face a classic startup dilemma: what to do next. And unfortunately, Mike and his team don’t agree on which persona to prioritize. Mike wants to build features that help the buyer persona grow their business: loyalty programs, promotions, and tools to bring in more customers.
